Row.Text: Your goal with World Marshal and Desperado is to become the world's ruler, so that you may usher in a new era in which only the strong survive. To do that, you need capital...and votes. You may need to focus more on the former so that you may obtain the latter. Your goal with World Marshal and Desperado is to become the world's ruler, so that you may usher in a new era in which only the strong survive. To do that, you need capital...and votes. You may need to focus more on the former so that you may obtain the latter. By hiring out World Marshal soldiers to lesser nations, you can start filling your coffers with money to be used later for bribes. These lesser nations may even start to fear and respect you.
